response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its rarity and significance, I believe its worth exceeds expectations, reaching up to $800,000. Considering its exceptional qualities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at this price. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and consider this offer thoughtfully. Should you be interested in exploring further details or discussing the specifics, please feel free to reach out to me at your earliest convenience. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with someone who will cherish it as much as I have.", "product_price": 800000}
